content: --स्वात्तः (written both as °स्वात्त and °ष्वात्त) (<ab>pl.</ab>) [अग्नितः <ab>i. e.</ab> श्राद्धीयविप्रकररूपानलात् सुष्ठु आत्तं ग्रहणं येषां ते] <ab>N.</ab> of a class of Pitṛs or Manes who, when living on earth, maintained the sacred or domestic fires, but who did not perform the Agniṣṭoma and other sacrifices. They are regarded as Manes of Gods and Brāhmaṇas and also as descendants of Marīci, <ls>Ms. 3. 195</ls> (मनुष्यजन्मन्यग्निष्टोमादियागमकृत्वा स्मार्तकर्मनिष्ठाः संतो मृत्वा च पितृत्वं गताः इति सायणः).
